title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage, the must-have travel companion for your next adventure! This 20" lightweight hardside suitcase is designed with convenience and style in mind. Available in a range of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, you can choose the perfect shade to suit your personal taste.

Crafted from high-quality ABS hard shell and a sturdy steel rod, this suitcase is built to withstand the rigors of travel, ensuring your belongings are protected at all times. Weighing in at just 5.62lb, it is incredibly lightweight, allowing you to pack more without worrying about exceeding weight restrictions.

With a generous capacity of 33L, this underseat luggage provides ample space to pack all your essentials for a 1-3 day trip. The 360-degree silent double spinner wheels ensure smooth and effortless maneuverability, gliding effortlessly over any terrain. Whether you're navigating busy airports or bustling city streets, these wheels will make your journey a breeze.

Safety is our top priority, which is why we have included a TSA lock on the side of the luggage. This lock ensures that your belongings are secure and gives you peace of mind while traveling. The textured finish not only adds an elegant touch to the design but also prevents scratches, keeping your suitcase looking brand new even after countless adventures.

The interior of this suitcase is organized and secure, featuring a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your belongings in place during transit. Additionally, the squared full-capacity design allows for efficient packing, maximizing the use of space.

Travel in style and convenience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage. Whether you're embarking on a business trip, a weekend getaway, or going back to school, this suitcase is the perfect companion. Don't miss out on the opportunity to fully enjoy your journey - get yours today!
